changes: New: Hover over cover to view the brand new playerbuttons :)
New: Fancy cover fadein/fadeout when the track changes
Hint: You can disable the animations in Winfys settings
Improved: Better text rendering (everything is smoother now)
Fixed: Local API might stop working if you leave Winfy alone for a while
Fixed: Local API might fail when Winfy and Spotify starts with Windows
Major version jump to 2.0. Chrome style, whoop whoop :)
New: Winfy utilizes the Spotify local API for better cover image support
Improved: Auto-save for app settings every minute
Fixed: Changes on the always on top setting are now applied immediately
New: Added credits for 3rd party libraries
Improved: Some internal fixes
Improved: Track and artists fields are hidden when no track is playing
Improved: Winfy detects play/pause better
New: You can adjust the volume through Winfy
New: You can now hide Winfy if Spotify is not running :)
Hooray: Out of beta!
Improved: Better cover recognition (again)
Improved: Winfy detects if Spotify is installed or not
New: Autorun
Fixed: Changelog could be null
Improved: Better cover recognition
Improved: Questionmark if no cover is found
New: Winfy shows a changelog!
Fixed: Issues on Windows XP
